data.actual_result: The third link is cut off.
data.expected_result: You should either be able to see the whole map or it should be scrollable.
data.short_description: [Website bug][Mobile only] On https://support(dot)discordapp(dot)com/hc/en-us, clicking on any of the options down (example:- Announcements) then clicking on another option from the selected page(eg:- [Resolved] Connecting issues) makes the map that tells where you are, cut off.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open https(colon)//support(dot)discordapp(dot)com/hc/en-us . - Click on "Announcements". - Click on [Resolved] Connectivity issues. - Observe the map that tells where you are.
